name: vuepress-plugin-typedoc
description: A VuePress plugin to build api documentation with TypeDoc.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.demo:start: rm -rf ./demo/docs/api && npm run build && cd demo && npm run dev
scripts.demo:build-and-serve: npm run build && cd demo && npm run build && npx http-server docs/.vuepress/dist -o
scripts.build-and-test: npm run build && npm run test

author: Thomas Grey
